column1: Little Goat Diner////I finally got in on a Monday night with less than a 10 minute wait after driving by numerous times on weekends and other times and seeing large clusters of folks hovering around out front.  Well now I know for myself what all the fuss is about. The place and the food are fabulous.  Best
column3: exciting diner/comfort food I've had in recent memory. We tried lots of stuff and all were "WOW
column9: which is not that easy cause we're pretty hard core when it comes to our food.
